amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a framework for closure of the detention facility at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, by December 31, 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 249 (Roll no. 231).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 249 (Roll no. 231).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
